name: Quadrangle
description: Quadrangle, a division of Info Edge (I) Ltd, is a leading search & selection firm headquartered in Noida, Uttar Pradesh. It is one of the most professional, progressive & multidimensional consulting entities in the industry today. As a high-profile team, we are driven by knowledge, integrity & performance and are deeply committed to our clients’ business success. We have branches across various locations to support top-quality delivery operations. We bring together market intelligence & knowledge expertise to help our clients recruit the best talent. We have set high standards for ourselves by adopting rigorous assessment methodologies. Our consultants invest a significant amount of time in understanding industrial, organizational and business perspectives of each of our clients and ensure quick delivery with precision through meticulous and detailed search processes. We play the role of a growth catalyst by identifying the best of the human resources at middle, senior & top management level. Our commitment is to develop strong relationships with our clients as well as candidates. We believe strong relationships lead to more diverse & broad access to talent. We tailor our approach to address the needs of our clients, as we understand that our work has a direct influence on clients’ business and on the careers of people we help hire.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees

enhanced_description: Quadrangle, a division of Info Edge (I) Ltd, is a leading search & selection firm established in 1997 and headquartered in Noida, Uttar Pradesh, with branches across various locations. As a professional and multidimensional consulting entity, it specializes in identifying and recruiting top talent at middle, senior, and top management levels. The firm leverages market intelligence and rigorous assessment methodologies to ensure quick and precise delivery. Quadrangle's commitment is to build strong relationships with clients and candidates, tailoring its approach to influence clients' business success and candidates' careers. Its core services include Executive & Leadership Search, Market Intelligence, and Project Based Hiring, aiming to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, facilitate faster and more efficient hiring of top talent, and reduce overall recruiting costs.
